snot noun
(PERSON)
[ C ] US informal disapproving a person who is rude and thinks that they are better than other people: Amber is such a snot!
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] slang a green or yellow substance sometimes produced in the nose, esp. when a person has a cold
[ C ] infml a person who is disliked for being rude and lacking respect for others: I remember this one little snot in my class who always talked back to the teacher.
